mapper.select:
select a.mn,a.site_name,b.`level` as airLevel,b.level,a.area,b.total_i, b.year,b.first_code, b.a21026_avg,b.a21004_avg,b.a34002_avg, b.a21005_avg,b.a05024_avg,b.a34004_avg
from airq_year b
INNER JOIN(select a.mn, max(b.year) year from airq_year b left join site_monitor_point a on b.mn = a.mn group by a.mn) c on b.mn = c.mn and b.year = c.year
left join site_monitor_point a on b.mn = a.mn WHERE a.company_id in
#{id}
and a.area = (#{area})
and a.mn = (#{mn})
and b.year >= (#{yearBegin})
and b.year <= (#{yearEnd})
order by b.year desc

select a.mn,a.site_name,b.`level` as airLevel,b.level,a.area,b.total_i, b.year,b.first_code, b.a21026_avg,b.a21004_avg,b.a34002_avg, b.a21005_avg,b.a05024_avg,b.a34004_avg
from airq_year b
INNER JOIN(select a.mn, max(b.year) year from airq_year b left join site_monitor_point a on b.mn = a.mn group by a.mn) c on b.mn = c.mn and b.year = c.year
left join site_monitor_point a on b.mn = a.mn WHERE a.company_id in
#{id}
and a.area = (#{area})
and a.mn = (#{mn})
and b.year >= (#{yearBegin})
and b.year <= (#{yearEnd})
order by b.year desc

select @rows:=@rows+1 as rows, if(@aqi=t.total_i,@rownum:=@rownum,@rownum:=@rownum+1) as rank, @aqi:=t.total_i,t.* from
(select a.mn,a.site_name,b.`level` as airLevel,b.level,a.area,b.total_i, a.company_id,b.year,b.first_code, b.a21026_avg,b.a21004_avg,b.a34002_avg, b.a21005_avg,b.a05024_avg,b.a34004_avg
from airq_year b
INNER JOIN(select a.mn, max(b.year) year from airq_year b left join site_monitor_point a on b.mn = a.mn group by a.mn) c on b.mn = c.mn and b.year = c.year
left join site_monitor_point a on b.mn = a.mn) t,(select @rownum:=0,@aqi:=0,@rows:=0) r WHERE t.company_id in
#{id}
and t.area = (#{area})
and t.mn = (#{mn})
and t.year = (#{queryDate})
order by ISNULL(t.total_i), t.total_i asc
